name: The Light Inside Darkness
description:
WARNING: THIS IS A HORROR GAME.

You're inside the monster! can you escape?

Find Enough light with your submarine to escape from the nightmare monster.

Most importantly avoid the eyes. They merge with the Walls. They are everywhere. There is no escape.

Please download the normal versions for some nice post processing and better looks. :) Webgl can't handle that stuff.

W- forward

A- left

S- backwards

D- right

Space- up

Left shift- down

Mouse- look left or right

You need 30 light cubes to escape. Then you can try hardcore mode.

I'm planning releasing an update after the rating of the game jam. The following features are planned:

- Improvement of movement. That you can move up and forward at the same time + being able to look up or down.  ✅ 

- Clearer instructions on what to do, how the enemy's  work ect. ✅

- Menu improvements. making it possible to play hardcore without finishing normal, Accessibility settings and making it possible to go back to the menu.

- Bigger and better map.

Any suggestions are welcome in the comments.
